result.execSummary:
The defendant Jessica L. Buck was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine(<=3g) [Modifiers: Repeater, Second and Subsequent Offense], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(e)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes:
Assessment, treatment, counseling as recommended by agent.

Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol.  

Full time work/full time school.

Case Called: 10:15 am  
Includes 15CF92, 15CF316, 15CF322.
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo; Deft appears in custody and with Atty Stephen Sawyer.

WAIVER OF PRELIM IN 15CF92, 15CF316, 15CF322:
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed.  Reading Waived.


PLEA IN 15CF92, 15CF316, 15CF322:
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves:
15CF316:
Ct. 2 (BJ-Felony)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (BJ-Felony)>>DRI.

15CF322:
Ct. 1 (Maintain Drug Trafficking Place-Repeater-Second and Subsequent Offense)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia to Manufacture, Compound, Covert, Produce, or Store Methamphetamine-Repeater-Second and Subsequent Offense)>>DRI.
Ct. 5 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 6 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia-Repeater)>>DRI.


  
PLEA: 
15CF92:
Ct. 1 (Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine-Repeater-Second and Subsequent Offense)>>GUILTY.

15CF316:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony)>>GUILTY.

15CF322:
Ct. 2 (Possess w/ Intent-Amphetamine-Repeater-Second and Subsequent Offense)>>GUILTY.
Ct. 4 (BJ-Felony)>>GUILTY.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 15CF92 Ct. 1: 8 years WSPS - 3 years IC and 5 years ES. All to run concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/Counseling as recommended by agent, AODA and follow up, Full time work/Full time school, Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. Court costs including a $100 by money to be paid to Marathon County Sheriff's Department in 15CF92. Defendant eligible for programming.  Credit to be sent to Court as a Stipulation.

15CF316 Ct. 1: 6 years WSPS- 3 years IC and 3 years ES. All to run concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/Counseling as recommended by agent, AODA and follow up, Full time work/Full time school, Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. Court costs including a $100 by money to be paid to Marathon County Sheriff's Department in 15CF92. Defendant eligible for programming.  Credit to be sent to Court as a Stipulation.

15CF322 Ct. 2: 8 years WSPS - 3 years IC and 5 years ES. All to run concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/Counseling as recommended by agent, AODA and follow up, Full time work/Full time school, Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. Court costs including a $100 by money to be paid to Marathon County Sheriff's Department in 15CF92. Defendant eligible for programming.  Credit to be sent to Court as a Stipulation.

15CF322 Ct. 4:  6 years WSPS- 3 years IC and 3 years ES. All to run concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/Counseling as recommended by agent, AODA and follow up, Full time work/Full time school, Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. Court costs including a $100 by money to be paid to Marathon County Sheriff's Department in 15CF92. Defendant eligible for programming.  Credit to be sent to Court as a Stipulation.
